faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Here you can find answers to common questions.

items.question: What documents are required to open an account in HiBank?
items.answer: To open an account, you need a valid national ID card, birth certificate, and a completed application form. Additional documents may be required depending on the account type.

items.question: How does the HiBank authentication process work?
items.answer: Authentication is done through personal information verification, biometrics, and one-time SMS codes. The process is fully digital and secure.

items.question: Can Iranians living abroad use HiBank services?
items.answer: Yes, Iranians living abroad can use limited HiBank services by providing valid documents and completing a special authentication process.

items.question: What are the uses of HiBank digital signature?
items.answer: The digital signature is used for transaction approval, contract signing, and financial document validation. It is legally valid and highly secure.

about.title: HiBank,
about.line1: The official digital banking brand of Karafarin Bank
about.description: This platform is designed to simplify, smarten, and personalize banking services for today’s users; a place where there is no need for in-person visits, paper forms, or scattered tools. Negah Bank Company, focusing on modern technologies, smooth user experience, and high security, has developed HiBank as a comprehensive solution for managing financial affairs and daily services. From account opening and digital checks to car services and bank cards, everything is gathered in a simple, secure, and always accessible space for those who live up-to-date and expect more from banking.
